amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investing in clean energy and preserving the environment.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 878 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 878 proposed by Senator Hirono. (consideration: CR S1970-1971; text: CR S1970-1971) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investing in clean energy and preserving the environment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 878 proposed by Senator Hirono.
